title: KKR Sees European Credit Renaissance Fueled by Asset-Backed Boom
description: KKR & Co. anticipates a boom in European asset-backed debt markets, following an acceleration in direct lending and deal making across the region.
content: KKR & Co. anticipates a boom in European asset-backed debt markets, following an acceleration in direct lending and deal making across the region.
